name: marketcode-optimization-dependencies
description: Additional dependencies for MarketCode database optimization

scripts.install-optimization: npm install lru-cache ioredis pg && npm install --save-dev @types/pg
scripts.db-optimize: echo 'Run database-optimizations.sql in your PostgreSQL database'
scripts.cache-test: node -e "const { CacheService } = require('./lib/cache'); console.log('Cache service loaded successfully');"
scripts.performance-test: node -e "const { PerformanceMonitor } = require('./lib/performance-monitor'); console.log('Performance monitor loaded successfully');"

author: MarketCode Database Administrator Team
